basic_info.description: Aku Satrya foundernya Zero-Inside. Aku biasa main di full-stack developer, network administration, data science, IoT system sama robotics. Selain aku programmer sama hardware developers, Aku juga bisa edit gambar sama buat video.

projects.title: GPON Network Monitoring System
projects.description: Developed information system and telegram bot for checking GPON status and optical information.

projects.title: Smart Humidifier and Purifier
projects.description: Developed a cyber physical system (CPS), that consist of ESP32 embedded device and mobile-web application. The system based on Intenet of Things, so it can connect to the internet and get access from the smartphone. How this device works is by filtering air using High Efficiency Particulate Air (HEPA) Filter and scent the room by aromatherapy steam. The device can be placed on the table and work 24 hours for keeping the room conditions. Beside that, there is alert mechanism by turn on the buzzer if somoone open the door when I'm sleeping, it prevent from theft.

projects.title: River Water Monitoring
projects.description: Developed a cyber physical system (CPS), that consist of arduino + LoRA embedded device and web application. The system used Antares platform as API

projects.title: Pet Tracker and Finder
projects.description: Developed a cyber physical system (CPS), that consist of ESP32 pet wearable embedded device and android application. The system can estimate the distance between pet and user for indoor tracking and outdoor tracking, also the buzzer will beep stronger if the pet closer

achievement.name: Second Winner on Internet of Things Challenge Competition Electrical Engineering Days ITB

achievement.name: Third Winner Balloon Atmosphere on KOMURINDO-KOMBAT 2017
